components.name: BmbOverlayComponent
BmbProgressBarComponent
BmbProgressCircleComponent
components.templateData:
<svg
  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
  onkeypress=""
  class="bmb_progress-circle"
  [attr.viewBox]="svg.viewBox"
  preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet"
  [attr.height]="svg.height"
  [attr.width]="svg.width"
>
  @if (this.showBackground) {
    <ng-container>
      <circle
        class="bmb_progress-circle-background"
        [attr.cx]="svg.backgroundCircle.cx"
        [attr.cy]="svg.backgroundCircle.cy"
        [attr.r]="svg.backgroundCircle.r"
      />
    </ng-container>
  }
  <circle
    class="bmb_progress-circle-fill"
    [attr.cx]="svg.circle.cx"
    [attr.cy]="svg.circle.cy"
    [attr.r]="svg.circle.r"
    [attr.stroke-width]="svg.circle.strokeWidth"
  />
  <path
    class="bmb_progress-circle-track"
    [attr.d]="svg.path.d"
    [attr.stroke-width]="svg.path.strokeWidth"
    [attr.fill]="svg.path.fill"
  />
  @if (options.showTitle || options.showValueLabel) {
    <text
      alignment-baseline="baseline"
      [attr.x]="svg.circle.cx"
      [attr.y]="svg.circle.cy"
      [attr.text-anchor]="svg.title.textAnchor"
    >
      @if (options.showTitle) {
        <ng-container>
          @for (tspan of svg.title.tspans; track tspan) {
            <tspan
              class="bmb_progress-circle-title"
              [attr.x]="svg.title.x"
              [attr.y]="svg.title.y"
              [attr.dy]="tspan.dy"
            >
              {{ tspan.span }}
            </tspan>
          }
        </ng-container>
      }
      @if (options.showValueLabel) {
        <ng-container>
          @for (tspan of svg.valueLabel.tspans; track tspan) {
            <tspan
              class="bmb_progress-circle-value-label"
              [attr.x]="svg.valueLabel.x"
              [attr.y]="svg.valueLabel.y"
              [attr.dy]="tspan.dy"
            >
              {{ tspan.span }}
            </tspan>
          }
        </ng-container>
      }
    </text>
  }
</svg>

components.name: DsNgComponent
StorybookToastWrapperComponent
components.template:
<button
  bmbButton
  appearance="primary"
  icon="home"
  size="small"
  position="left"
  [case]="false"
  (click)="openModalComponent()"
>
  Open Modal
</button>

inputsClass.name: content
inputsClass.defaultValue: 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.'

propertiesClass.name: data
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
{
    title: 'Modal Title',
    subtitle: 'Modal Subtitle',
    content: 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.',
    size: 'large',
    type: 'action',
    alertStyle: 'error',
    primaryBtnLabel: 'Ok',
    scrollable: false,
  }

components.name: StorybookToastWrapperComponent
StorybookToastWrapperComponent
components.template:
<button
  bmbButton
  appearance="primary"
  icon="home"
  size="small"
  position="left"
  [case]="false"
  (click)="onButtonClick()"
>
  Click Here
</button>
<bmb-toast
  [message]="message"
  [appearance]="appearance"
  [duration]="duration"
  [position]="position"
></bmb-toast>

variables.name: calculateSize
customizable
customizable
customizable
customizable
variables.defaultValue:
(): StoryFn => (args) => ({
  props: args,
  template: `<button bmbButtonGroup [appearance]="appearance" [size]="size">
    <button>Button 1</button>
    <button>Button 2</button>
    <button>Button 3</button>
  </button>`,
})
